title: MOUSE PROBLEMS in game
body: so when i start the game i do the usually level up my abilities with control the ability but when i want to move my camera it doesn't move anywhere and when i try to buy something from the shop i gotta push the thing where it says how much gold you have multiple times and when i went to setting i had to push everything multiple times until it worked this happens every game i have to leave then it works but with my last game it didn't go back to normal kept leaving and coming back but it wasn't working

replies.body:
Have you made any modifications to your game files?  There could be an issue with your config folders that's causing some problems with your input, so let's restore them to default as a first step:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if that works for you!
